'''May Fortune Find You''' is a [[Login Event]] in [[Version 3.4]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/01/19 04:00:00 – 2023/02/03 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 5 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, log in on 7 days in total to receive Intertwined Fate ×10 and other rewards!
